summary: A journalist, who is more of an activist teams up with the sister of a murdered model, as she gets interested in the case and wants to bring justice to her case.
cast: Rani Mukerji|Vidya Balan|Myra Karn|Neil Bhoopalam|Rajesh Sharma|Satyadeep Misra|Yogendra Tiku|Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub|Manoj Bakshi|Abhishek Banerjee|Vintee Bansal|Pallavi Batra|Ranjit Batra|Mahesh Bhatt|Purnendu Bhattacharya|Eisha Chopra|Sushil Dahiya|Avijit Dutt|Maanvi Gagroo|Ashish Goyal|Raj Kumar Gupta|Suman Gupta|Armin-Paul Hampel|Hanish Kalia|Ravi Katara|Amar Kaushik|Jasbir Malik|Vidushi Mehra|Shammi Narang|Bubbles Sabharwal|Aayeinaa Sareen|Ritesh Shah|Ashu Sharma|Shireesh Sharma|Yogesh Shirke|Geeta Sudan|Anuj Tikku
title: No One Killed Jessica
